description: Translate rows with NFL polytype. Note that none of these rows have species info so each polygon is either LYR or NFL.

Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID. Note that polyid in ON02 can have up to 19 characters. To trace back to the source polyon, we split this into two strings during loading, polyid_1_10, and polyid_11_20. Concatenating these and dropping any x characters will return the original polyid identifier.
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100

Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow. Note that poly_type = 'FOR' when there is forest info, and when poly_type != 'FOR' ospcomp and uspcomp are always empty. So the max_layer_number for NFL row translations will be set to 3 by createMappingsView(), however it will always return 1. Note that polytype bsh and TMS are non-productive LYR value that are counted as valid layer 1 values.
No crown closure value for nfl
No crown closure value for nfl
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values
Maps source value to NON_FOR_ANTH using list of values
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
